title: [Large-scale] Nursing Education Design for Applying Therapeutic Patient Education (TPE) Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based flexible learning environment for working professionals, emphasizing interactive digital content.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core theories and practical principles of therapeutic patient education (TPE).
Learners can design TPE educational modules by applying student-centered teaching methods to real clinical scenarios.
Learners can submit TPE project outcomes incorporating peer feedback through mobile platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
